name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflix Simple Subs: Remove Closed Captions

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove closed captions (CC) in Netflix subtitles. No more [suspenseful music] or (indistinct radio chatter). Spoken dialogue only.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove closed captioning (CC) from Netflix's English subtitles.  You'll no longer see things like [suspenseful music] or (indistinct radio chatter).  This this extension subtitles should only show dialogue.

==CHANGELOG==
- 0.2: Updated title. Minor tweaks.  Chrome Web Store. now requires a screenshot
